description: This object defines the metadata for your plugin. This information is used to create local store entry.

description.description: Give your plugin a nice description!

author.description: Provide the email address associated with your developer account

executableName.description: The name of your executable such as plugin.py

installScript.description: The installation script. If none, default (install.sh) will be used.

documentationLink.description: Link to the documentation for this plugin

licenseLink.description: Link to the license for this plugin

shortPoll.description: Initial short poll interval in seconds

longPoll.description: Initial long poll interval in seconds

profileVersion.description: The Polyglot profile version. Such as 3.0.0 (default)

initialLogLevel.description: The log level when the plugin starts

enableDiscovery.description: Enable the plugin to discover other devices on the network using mDNS or UPnP or other mechanims.

enableOAUTH2.description: Enable the plugin to handle OAUTH 2 authentication. If you enabled this feature, you must also provide OAuth Configuration parameters on the store entry (not safe in this file)

worksOnPolisy.description: Whether or not this plugin works on Polisy

worksOnEisy.description: Whether or not this plugin works on Polisy

requiresIoXAccess.description: Whether or not this plugin can directly communiate with IoX. If you choose true, the customer must explicitly accept
